TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DeviceSpecificControlBuilder extends System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: Fornece suporte de análise para constructos DeviceSpecific/Choice.

span.span: Provides parsing support for DeviceSpecific/Choice constructs.

summary.span: Para saber mais sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis ASP.NET, veja Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (Aplicativos móveis e sites com ASP.NET).

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O classe internamente é criado e usado pelo analisador de página durante a análise de um [ \](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/k20acyeh(v=vs.85)) elemento.The class is internally created and used by the page parser when parsing a [\](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/k20acyeh(v=vs.85)) element. O classe implementa os seguintes comportamentos de persistência: ignora o espaço em branco diretamente dentro do controle e permite apenas um [ \](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) elemento como filho.The class implements the following persistence behaviors: It ignores white space directly inside the control, and it allows only a [\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) element as child.

permission.span: para operação em um ambiente hospedado.

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
